description: Test prompts for Software Developer agent focusing on full-stack development, serverless architectures, and Java development

test_prompts.prompt: Create a Lambda function for processing S3 events with error handling, logging, and performance optimization.
Design and implement a REST API using API Gateway and Lambda for a customer management system.
Develop a React frontend with AWS Amplify backend for a task management application.
Create a Spring Boot application with AWS SDK integration for managing S3 objects and DynamoDB data.
Design and implement Java microservices architecture using Spring Boot, API Gateway, and ECS.
Integrate a SageMaker model into a web application for real-time predictions with A/B testing.
Create a computer vision application using Amazon Rekognition for image analysis and content moderation.
Create a real-time dashboard using React, WebSockets, and Kinesis for monitoring application metrics.
Design and implement automated testing strategy including unit, integration, and end-to-end tests for a serverless application.
Implement OAuth 2.0 authentication using Amazon Cognito with role-based access control.

validation_criteria.development_proficiency: Demonstrates full-stack development skills with multiple programming languages
